citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
23-Oct-17.
Arrived at facility at 11:00 am. No one was available for an inspection. Repeatedly knocked on gate with no
response. Called phone number on file with no response. Waited thirty minutes and still no one available for
inspection. Left business card in gate and departed from the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00  am on
23-Oct-17.
Arrived at facility at 11:00  am.  No one was available for an inspection.  Repeatedly knocked on gate with no
response.  Called phone number on file with no response.  Waited thirty minutes and still no one available for
inspection.  Left business card in gate and departed from the facility.
